guide.title: Before you start...
guide.paragraph_1: Your objective is to gain points by completing tasks.
guide.paragraph_2: The game ends when you have completed all the tasks in every campus.
guide.paragraph_3: Your highscore is determined by your answers and how fast you complete the tasks.
guide.paragraph_4: Don't let the score drop below zero or the game is over!

panel.title: Instructions
panel.paragraph_1: Begin by selecting a task from the markers on the map. Then start the task from the button below the map.
panel.paragraph_2: The order in which you complete the tasks and campuses is up to you. Try to answer the questions as quickly as possible!
panel.paragraph_3: You can switch between the campuses at any time using the Change Campus -button.
panel.paragraph_4: The active campus and your total score is displayed in the header bar.
